news.content: Excited to announce that I've started a new role as Senior Developer at Tech Company! Looking forward to working on cutting-edge projects and growing with an amazing team.
My latest blog post on React performance optimization received over 5,000 views. Thanks to everyone who read and shared it! Read it here
Completed the AWS Solutions Architect certification! This has deepened my understanding of cloud architecture and best practices.
Speaking at the Web Development Conference 2025 about 'Modern Frontend Architecture'. Hope to see you there! Learn more
Reached 10k followers on GitHub! ðŸŽ‰ Thank you all for your support and interest in my projects and contributions.
Launched my new portfolio website with an improved design and blog platform. Check it out and let me know what you think!
Contributing to open source project X. It's been an amazing learning experience collaborating with developers from around the world.
My article 'Getting Started with TypeScript' was featured in the JavaScript Weekly newsletter. Thank you for the support!
